A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I am convinced the Critics were paid or were afraid of saying what they really thought\, that is my only conclusion to their scores. Honestly\, 90% of you critics seem so scared to say what you really thought.

While The Last Jedi had fleeting moments of nostalgia\, they were far and few between with often a soundtrack accompanying them that ignited an internal conflict.. "am I watching Star Wars or Snow White?" From the utterly wasted opportunities to the final battle - it was the most dissapointment I have ever felt leaving the cinema.

Now let me be straight\, this was a good movie. It had everything you sort of wanted\, laughs\, action\, unbelievable science fiction - but it was also a bad movie. 

Bad for old school starwars fans\, and apparently great for kids who never saw the original in the theatre and who really don't know any better\, so I can't blame them for the fanboy love.
